dict.string: MiBoKo needs permission to use your camera to record videos.
MiBoKo needs access to your photo library in order to set an avatar for your profile.
MiBoKo needs to be able to access motion usage.
Miboko needs Bluetooth access. MiBoKo Would Like to Use Bluetooth. MiBoKo requires permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with your Transmitter.
Miboko needs Bluetooth access. MiBoKo Would Like to Use Bluetooth. MiBoKo requires permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with your Transmitter.

Miboko needs location access. MiBoKo Would Like to Use Bluetooth. MiBoKo requires permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with your Transmitter. Would Like to Use Bluetooth. MiBoKo requires permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with your Transmitter.

Miboko needs location access. MiBoKo Would Like to Use Bluetooth. MiBoKo requires permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with your Transmitter. Would Like to Use Bluetooth. MiBoKo requires permission to use Bluetooth to communicate with your Transmitter.
MiBoKo needs permission to use your microphone to record videos.
MiBoKo needs access to the photo gallery for picking photos and videos.
